column4: I have received approval from the wife to purchase a laptop for christmas.. I am looking at this model from Gateway (saw it at Best Buy) http://support.gateway.com/s/Mobile/2007/SonicC/1014612R/1014612Rnv.shtml    anything that stands out that will be a problem to run Ubuntu on?
I have an Acer Aspire 5100 and it works well w/ ubuntu, it has some wifi issues, but thats kind of a general issue
what I like is the 17" display and sub $800 price tag
my aspire is 15.4" and $499, 64 bit cpu and ati xpress 1100 gfx
